An old client is looking for recommendations for a freelancer who can set up and run cold email campaigns. Anyone have any recommendations, or interest in such a project? Feel free to DM me and thanks in advance!

text:
Hi everyone! I’m hiring a Content Specialist to join our team at Sprout Social. We’re committed to building a world-class marketing team and this role will specifically focus on content that drives leads, trials and ultimately MQLs. The role is about 80% writing and 20% support for projects focused on optimizing content and increasing conversion. US-only, remote-friendly (see list of approved states on the app).

You’d be a good fit for this role if you enjoy:

• Developing educational and thought-provoking content that solves readers’ challenges and opens them to new ideas
• Breaking down complex concepts using compelling stories and engaging formats
• Digging into data to come up with ideas to optimize content performance
• Keeping up with the latest social media and marketing trends
• Seeing your content make real business impact
Please thread or DM if you have any questions! <https://sproutsocial.com/careers/open-positions/#/2614085/content-specialist>

attachments.title: Open Positions | Sprout Social
attachments.text: View open positions in marketing, sales, design and engineering at Sprout Social. Our team is growing. You will too.
attachments.fallback: Sprout Social: Open Positions | Sprout Social

text:
Hi everyone! My name is Lex and I am the Senior Talent & People Ops Manager at Launch Potato, South Florida's fastest-growing media company leveraging data science, and fun to continue to build our portfolio of category-leading direct-to-consumer brands that attract millions of users. We are looking for a Senior Content Marketer to join our FinanceBuzz team.
 
The Senior Content Marketer will develop unique, newsworthy personal finance stories for FinanceBuzz. The successful candidate will have an entrepreneurial spirit and will own the content process from ideation through data crunching and writing. This role collaborates closely with the Media Relations team throughout the process to devise the pitch angles they'll use to promote the stories. This is a great role for someone who loves data-driven journalism, is familiar with SEO best practices, and has top-notch editorial sensibility.

<https://launch-potato.breezy.hr/p/9445c80b04e2?utm_source=SuperPath&utm_medium=Slack&utm_campaign=senior_content_marketer|View the full job posting here>

Please feel free to share!

text: help scout is looking for a remote content writer: <https://jobs.lever.co/helpscout/9e4981ad-9eda-414c-8df6-d693b52d3553>

attachments.title: Help Scout - Content Writer
attachments.text: At Help Scout, we make support software that helps more than 10,000 small businesses talk with their customers. We’re a fully remote team of 100+ employees in 75+ cities around the world. :earth_americas: Over the years, we’ve built a large, engaged audience by publishing educational, top-of-funnel content for support professionals and small business leaders. We approach content as an embodiment of our vision to empower customer-centric businesses with tools that serve customers in the most helpful, human way. In 2021, we want to improve our presence in search when our target customers are looking for the solutions Help Scout provides, and we’re looking for a content writer passionate about our product to help us meet this goal. This content writer will be the content team’s resident subject-matter expert on both our audience and Help Scout’s product. You’ll work closely with leadership, product marketing, product management, sales, and support to develop both a deep understanding of the pain poi

text:
*Higher Logic is hiring a Growth Marketing and ABM Manager*

*This is a full-time gig.*

*About this role:* Not a content job, but content adjacent. Not sure if this fits exactly for the group but thought I'd share for anyone who has marketing friends seeking jobs or wants to get out of content and into a campaigns/ABM role. 
<https://www.higherlogic.com/about/company/jobs/?gh_jid=4311780003>

*You can apply here:* <https://www.higherlogic.com/about/company/jobs/?gh_jid=4311780003>

<@UMQASRN1W>

:wave::skin-tone-5: For anyone based in North America who might be interested in something a bit different, here’s a part-time contract *social media role*:

<https://thisisdl.com/|DL Eyewear>, actor Dan Levy’s labor of love, is hiring a Social Media Manager! You’ll be working on a small intimate team running their social media accounts including their existing <https://twitter.com/dleyewear|Twitter >and <https://www.instagram.com/dleyewear/|Instagram>. They’re looking for a smart, creative, and socially-conscious marketer who can consistently create great content! :sparkles:

Please contact Ashley Ayre with your resume and a bit about yourself. Her email is <mailto:ashleyayre@me.com|ashleyayre@me.com>!

text:
Hey, everyone! I was recently promoted, so we’re hiring a Content Developer to replace me.

Great opportunity for someone earlier in their career who wants a full-time position with good benefits. 

US preferred, but I imagine they’d be open to other arrangements if it’s the right fit. 

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out! 

<http://lurn.applytojob.com/apply/WnteUd7wAc/Content-Developer|http://lurn.applytojob.com/apply/WnteUd7wAc/Content-Developer>
